Dear ARAMEX team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for land freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Bahrain and Oman regions that are listed in your final offer . We evaluated all proposals according to the selection criteria outlined in the tender document. Your submission matched the requirements, and we were impressed by the quality of your proposal. 

We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome. 

Please find attached CHALHOUB GROUP Contract template for freight collaboration , and I request your attention to review it and sign it as soon as possible. In case of any modification , kindly mention details in comments without changing the format .

 

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal.

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal. We are delighted to have you on board and look forward to working with you. 

Best regards, 

Sonia

Dear ARAMEX team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for land freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Bahrain and Oman regions that are listed in your final offer . We evaluated all proposals according to the selection criteria outlined in the tender document. Your submission matched the requirements, and we were impressed by the quality of your proposal. 

We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome. 

Please find attached CHALHOUB GROUP Contract template for freight collaboration , and I request your attention to review it and sign it as soon as possible. In case of any modification , kindly mention details in comments without changing the format .

 

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal.

Sonia

Dear ARAMEX team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for land freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Bahrain and Oman regions that are listed in your final offer . We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome.

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for land freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal.

Dear ARAMEX team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for land freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Bahrain and Oman regions that are listed in your final offer . We evaluated all proposals according to the selection criteria outlined in the tender document. Your submission matched the requirements, and we were impressed by the quality of your proposal. 

We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome. 

Please find attached CHALHOUB GROUP Contract template for freight collaboration , and I request your attention to review it and sign it as soon as possible. In case of any modification , kindly mention details in comments without changing the format .

 

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal.

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal. We are delighted to have you on board and look forward to working with you. 

Best regards, 

Sonia

Dear ARAMEX team ,

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for land freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal.
